de.title: Deutsche Adjektivdeklination
de.content:
Die Deklination von Adjektiven im Deutschen h√§ngt vom verwendeten Artikel und dem Kasus des Substantivs ab. Es gibt drei Hauptmuster:

1. Nach bestimmten Artikeln (der, die, das)
2. Nach unbestimmten Artikeln (ein, eine)
3. Ohne Artikel

## Nach bestimmten Artikeln

| Kasus     | Maskulin | Feminin | Neutral | Plural |
|-----------|----------|---------|---------|--------|
| Nominativ | -e       | -e      | -e      | -en    |
| Akkusativ | -en      | -e      | -e      | -en    |
| Dativ     | -en      | -en     | -en     | -en    |
| Genitiv   | -en      | -en     | -en     | -en    |

## Nach unbestimmten Artikeln

| Kasus     | Maskulin | Feminin | Neutral |
|-----------|----------|---------|---------|
| Nominativ | -er      | -e      | -es     |
| Akkusativ | -en      | -e      | -es     |
| Dativ     | -en      | -en     | -en     |
| Genitiv   | -en      | -en     | -en     |

## Ohne Artikel

| Kasus     | Maskulin | Feminin | Neutral | Plural |
|-----------|----------|---------|---------|--------|
| Nominativ | -er      | -e      | -es     | -e     |
| Akkusativ | -en      | -e      | -es     | -e     |
| Dativ     | -em      | -er     | -em     | -en    |
| Genitiv   | -en      | -er     | -en     | -er    |

content:
Adjective declension in German depends on the article used and the case of the noun. There are three main patterns:

1. After definite articles (der, die, das)
2. After indefinite articles (ein, eine)
3. Without articles

## After Definite Articles

| Case      | Masculine | Feminine | Neuter | Plural |
|-----------|-----------|----------|---------|--------|
| Nominative| -e        | -e       | -e      | -en    |
| Accusative| -en       | -e       | -e      | -en    |
| Dative    | -en       | -en      | -en     | -en    |
| Genitive  | -en       | -en      | -en     | -en    |

## After Indefinite Articles

| Case      | Masculine | Feminine | Neuter |
|-----------|-----------|----------|--------|
| Nominative| -er       | -e       | -es    |
| Accusative| -en       | -e       | -es    |
| Dative    | -en       | -en      | -en    |
| Genitive  | -en       | -en      | -en    |

## Without Articles

| Case      | Masculine | Feminine | Neuter | Plural |
|-----------|-----------|----------|---------|--------|
| Nominative| -er       | -e       | -es     | -e     |
| Accusative| -en       | -e       | -es     | -e     |
| Dative    | -em       | -er      | -em     | -en    |
| Genitive  | -en       | -er      | -en     | -er    |
